Name: Mecha Tactics
About the game: Build mechas, command your squad members to victory and conquest, seize the stars, settle randomized unknown star systems, defend your faction from hordes of assailants. About: -All actions avaliable to your mechas depend on the choice of parts for every mecha in your squad. -Diferent mecha parts grant different abilities and stats. -Every Ability has a set of effects(damage,movement,buffs). -Every Ability targets differently with selectable targets or directional or area of effects. -Every round mechas roll initiatives(1d20 + Initiative) whoever rolls higher acts first. -Every act has a AP and a EP cost, Powerful skills will cost more. Featuring: -Randomized enemy squads. -Randomized star systems. -Grid based Combat. -Local 2-Players versus mode. Feel free to send suggestions, complaints and questions to nullbudgetgames@gmail.com
